## Description {#details}

This class provides the core functionality of linking in LLVM.

It keeps a pointer to the merged module so far. It doesn&#39;t take ownership of the module since it is assumed that the user of this class will want to do something with it after the linking.

Definition at line 22 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/linker/linker-h">Linker.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### linkInModule() {#a5a864cc4d71e0234e9f8d786f8716804}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Linker::linkInModule (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &gt; Src, unsigned Flags=<a href="#a355e72d5c66c2cd4dd386466d8529e8fa063ce462fbdba434772c3d043c4d8c7c">Flags::None</a>, std::function&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringset">StringSet</a>&lt;&gt; &amp;)&gt; InternalizeCallback=&#123;&#125;)</>}>
Link <code>Src</code> into the composite.

Passing OverrideSymbols as true will have symbols from Src shadow those in the Dest.

Passing InternalizeCallback will have the linker call the function with the new module and a list of global value names to be internalized by the callback.

Returns true on error.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/linker/linker-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/linker/linker-h">Linker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/linkmodules-cpp/#l00623">623</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/linkmodules-cpp">LinkModules.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### linkModules() {#a72e11e8404db974fa400748b888ea49d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool Linker::linkModules (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; Dest, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &gt; Src, unsigned Flags=<a href="#a355e72d5c66c2cd4dd386466d8529e8fa063ce462fbdba434772c3d043c4d8c7c">Flags::None</a>, std::function&lt; void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringset">StringSet</a>&lt;&gt; &amp;)&gt; InternalizeCallback=&#123;&#125;)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function links two modules together, with the resulting Dest module modified to be the composite of the two input modules.

If an error occurs, true is returned and ErrorMsg (if not null) is set to indicate the problem. Upon failure, the Dest module could be in a modified state, and shouldn&#39;t be relied on to be consistent.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/linker/linker-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/linker/linker-h">Linker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/linkmodules-cpp/#l00640">640</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/linkmodules-cpp">LinkModules.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
